name: Bastet Temple Cat
description: The Bastet Temple Cat is a small, agile creature with a sleek fur coat and an enchanting presence. It is known for its charming personality and is capable of assisting spellcasters.
memorable: Its ability to charm opponents with its Fascinating Purr and act as a magical reservoir for spellcasters makes it a unique companion in combat.
goals: To serve as a companion and assist spellcasters by imbuing them with spells.
relations: Often found with clerics or paladins who worship Bastet, it may have ties with other temple guardians.
environment: Typically found in temples or sacred spaces dedicated to Bastet.
strengths: Exceptional agility and stealth, allows for effective scouting and charming abilities.
weaknesses: Lacks physical strength and toughness, making it vulnerable to direct combat.
attacks: Can perform a Multiattack including a Bite and Claws attack, dealing piercing and slashing damage respectively.
most_powerful_ability: Fascinating Purr, which can incapacitate opponents and compel them to move towards it.
senses: Possesses Keen Smell, granting it advantage on Perception checks based on scent.
skills: Has high Stealth and Perception skills, making it adept at avoiding detection and spotting hidden creatures.
additional_information: Can imbuing spells without expending spell slots for clerics and paladins.
Capable of casting guidance at will.
Can charm humanoids within a 30-foot range with its Fascinating Purr ability.
Excels in social interactions due to high Charisma.
Can enhance its agility using the Cat's Grace spell.
spellcasting: Can cast guidance at will, charm person and cure wounds three times per day, and enhance ability once per day (Cat's Grace).
